channel.title: 2 things, Reaally need help!
channel.description:
Hello. I need help with 2 things. Ive tried makin a webclient for a week now, but i just cant solve the mystery, how to do it:D So if anyone would like to help me, thank you! And the second thing is, that I would like to make some commands.
If i say ::reduce defence , Then it reduces def to 1 If i say ::Increase Defence , Then it increases def to 99
And that to atk, str and def! Thank you!!! MSN: nunklike@hotmail.com

Hello.
I need help with 2 things.
Ive tried makin a webclient for a week now, but i just cant solve the mystery, how to do it:D
So if anyone would like to help me, thank you!
